Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student can draw two students holding objects that resemble cups.
The student can draw a line between the two cups to represent a connection, but without understanding its purpose.
CANNOT: The student cannot effectively illustrate how sound travels through the string (student lacks understanding of sound travel).
The student cannot consistently show one student speaking and the other listening using the device (may depict both doing unrelated activities).
The student cannot include accurate labels or arrows to indicate the function of the string telephone (may omit or use incorrect labels/arrows).
The student cannot convey the idea that the device is used to communicate over a distance (may think the drawing just needs cups and a line).
